features: Large Capacity Shoe Storage -- Dimensions being 33"L x 12.2"W x 52"H, this shoe rack is capable of holding up to 28-35 pairs of shoes. Perfect shoe rack for closet, entryway, garage, and bedroom. There are two 16.5”x13.4” large cells specially designed for kneel boots and other big storage organization boxes. So it will also be a great garage or closet storage organizer for your tools or other stuff.

Shoes Rack with Cover -- This closet shoe organizer comes with a highly quality dustproof cover with zipper to keep dust off your shoes and stuff, and there is a velcro so you can roll up the curtain for easy access or storage. Moreover, the cover is designed with side pockets where you can collect your keys, cards, purses, shopping bags, etc.

Waterproof PP Sheets Design -- The shoe storage cabinet is composed of high-quality PP sheets and upgraded connectors. The PP sheets prevent dust and water from falling into other shoes. Most importantly, it’s much more convenient and suitable for storing high heels. No more falling through the slots.

Sturdy & Easy to Assemble -- Our shoe shelf is made of upgraded sturdy anti-rust metal tubes and strengthened connectors, which provides outstanding stability and load capacity. Installation is as easy as pie. You may check the video in the photo gallery section for reference. Besides, a mini wooden hammer is included for labor-saving.

Portable & Easy to Clean -- This shoe stand holder is compact yet light weight. You can easily move and place it to the place you planned for it after installation. Cleaning is super easy too. The cover and layers are waterproof. Just wipe them with a wet cloth if needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powder-coated Metal Tubes The powder-coated metal tubes prevent the surface of the shoe rack from rusting or corroding, making the shoe rack more durable. Sturdy and Durable Design The metal tubes and PP connectors enable our shoe rack organizer maintain a sturdy structure and won't fall apart. Waterproof PP Sheets With layers made of PP sheets, which prevent dust and water from falling into other shoes, this shoe organizer is great for storing high heels. No more falling through the slots.

Door with Velcro There is a Velcro on the front of the dust cover, you can roll up the curtain for easy access or storage of shoes. Door with zipper The dust cover is designed with a zipper so that you can zip it up to keep dust off your shoes, providing you a more tidy home. Waterproof Non-woven Cover The dust cover is water-resistant and cleaning is as easy as pie. Just wipe it with a wet cloth if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and functional
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as an economical way to store my shoes vertically. I have quite a few pairs of shoes so this only handles my shoes that are not in boxes. However, I do have at least 25 to 30 pairs of shoes on this shoe rack at the moment. It is very durable and easy to set up. I like that it has the cover so you could zip it if you needed to to keep it from having dust, or what have you. Overall this was worth every penny and has made my shoe storage much more streamlined. I like that it has space for tall boots as well as daily wear regular shoes.This is also light weight and easy to put wherever you want it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! A real strong structure and materials!
reviews.reviewText: I bought from another brand ( aluminum and very soft plastic connectors) and the quality was horrible in couple weeks the structure was a complete disaster! But this one its real strong structure and very good materialsPlease try to buy this option!! its real strong and the cover for the dust is perfect to the structure and non mistakes in the measure like a glove! I and very happy with this furniture for shoes!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for shoe storage
reviews.reviewText: This shoe rack was easy to put together took about 30 minutes. Neat looking, although it is not as sturdy as others have wrote in their review. But for the price it is good enough

reviews.reviewText: This arrived on time and was easy for my hisband and me to assemble.My shoes and boots fit in the spaces.The side pockets are a pluss.I'm very happy with this shoe closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Outer protector was not as strong as its supposed to be
reviews.reviewText: Item itself very nice and metals works and hold whole item well. But outside fabric was really poor and started tear. Also, it started peeling off and left black marks on your finger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great and easy to setup. Ensure all parts are there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unsatisfying Shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shoe rack in hopes to organize my closet and free up space. The Amazon picture made it seem the frame was hard/ sturdy with only the flap cover loose. There is no hard frame just the skeleton, it's a cloth material and it is loose made of the grocery store cloth bags mesh material. While no tools are needed to assemble it, it came with a small wooden mallot to help tighten the grip of the pvc pieces. One small smack and the mallot broke. This is more in the $15.00 range and not $30.00. I'm giving it 1 start for the ease of assembly. That saved this item's rating.
